languages.text: Еретик уничтожен, Лорд-капитан может беспрепятственно покинуть Райкад Минорис на уцелевшем шаттле. Рекомендовано воспользоваться этой возможностью в кратчайшие сроки.
The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.
languages.original_text: Еретик уничтожен, Лорд-капитан может беспрепятственно покинуть Райкад Минорис на уцелевшем шаттле. Рекомендовано воспользоваться этой возможностью в кратчайшие сроки.

traits.locale_text: The heretic has been purged. Now Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.
The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.
The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.

languages.text: Der Ketzer wurde eliminiert. Der Lord Captain kann Rykad Minoris nun mit dem letzten Shuttle verlassen. Es wäre empfehlenswert, diese Gelegenheit ohne Verzögerung zu nutzen.
languages.original_text: The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.

traits.locale_text: Der Ketzer wurde eliminiert. Der Lord Captain kann Rykad Minoris nun mit dem letzten Shuttle verlassen. Es wäre empfehlenswert, diese Gelegenheit ohne Verzögerung zu nutzen.

languages.text: L'hérétique a été purgé. À présent, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} peut quitter Rykad Minoris à bord de la dernière navette. Il est fortement recommandé de saisir cette opportunité sans attendre.
languages.original_text: The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.

traits.locale_text: L'hérétique a été purgé. À présent, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} peut quitter Rykad Minoris à bord de la dernière navette. Il est fortement recommandé de saisir cette opportunité sans attendre.

languages.text: 異端者は粛清された。これでロード・キャプテンは残されたシャトルでライカド・ミノリスを離れることができる。推奨される行動は、素早くこの機会を手にすることだ。
languages.original_text: The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.

traits.locale_text: 異端者は粛清された。これでロード・キャプテンは残されたシャトルでライカド・ミノリスを離れることができる。推奨される行動は、素早くこの機会を手にすることだ。

languages.text: El hereje ha sido purgado. Ahora {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán puede salir de Rykad Minoris en la última lanzadera. Sería muy recomendable aprovechar la ocasión ahora que aún hay tiempo.
languages.original_text: The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.

traits.locale_text: El hereje ha sido purgado. Ahora {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán puede salir de Rykad Minoris en la última lanzadera. Sería muy recomendable aprovechar la ocasión ahora que aún hay tiempo.

languages.text: 所有异端分子已经肃清，领主舰长可以乘坐其余的穿梭机离开小莱卡德。建议领主舰长片刻都不要耽误，立刻离开这个地方。
languages.original_text: The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.

traits.locale_text: 所有异端分子已经肃清，领主舰长可以乘坐其余的穿梭机离开小莱卡德。建议领主舰长片刻都不要耽误，立刻离开这个地方。

languages.text: Kâfir ortadan kaldırıldı. Artık Lord Kaptan, kalan mekikle Rykad Minoris'i terk edebilir. Çok vakit kaybetmeden bu eylemin gerçekleştirilmesi en doğru hareket olur.
languages.original_text: The heretic has been purged. Now the Lord Captain can leave Rykad Minoris on the remaining shuttle. The recommended course of action is to grasp this opportunity without delay.

traits.locale_text: Kâfir ortadan kaldırıldı. Artık Lord Kaptan, kalan mekikle Rykad Minoris'i terk edebilir. Çok vakit kaybetmeden bu eylemin gerçekleştirilmesi en doğru hareket olur.
